title: Tempest
description: Ryan Tempest is a man who dragged himself out of the gutter where he was raised by a prostitute mother. He has never experienced love and definitely does not believe in it!However, Shenna Williams is a woman who not only believes in love, she has experienced it in all its glory - who can live up to that! An intriguing story of mismatched love and murderous jealousy - and a husband that just won't stay dead!
author: Susan Elle
